tool.name: Selectable Stanford NER v2.1.0
tool.help:
**What it does**
Generates named entity annotations (Person, Organization, Location).
**Required annotations**
* `Token <http://vocab.lappsgrid.org/Token.html>`_ (LIF) * `Sentence <http://vocab.lappsgrid.org/Sentence.html>`_ (LIF)
**Generated Annotations**
A LIF document with a new view containing `NamedEntity <http://vocab.lappsgrid.org/NamedEntity.html>`_ annotations
**License**
Stanford CoreNLP is licensed under `the GNU General Public License <https://stanfordnlp.github.io/CoreNLP/#license>`_.
